schema:creator: Long, J.D.
schema:description: Second oldest mission in California. Original tile roof has been replaced with shingles. Facade is of burned tile, all main walls of adobe block. Two kilns for burning tile show at the left in 1 ([b](/collection/ag_eng/AR-012/AR_012_1317b)). Nearly all the arches and openings, including those in the main walls of the structure, are supported by timbers recently placed ([a](/collection/ag_eng/AR-012/AR_012_1317a)).
schema:keywords: .1 Materials, manufacture, tests, strength, preservation, etc.
schema:name: San Antonio Mission, Jolon (a)
schema:publisher: UC Davis Library, Archives and Special Collections
schema:sdPublisher: UC Davis, Archives and Special Collections
